description: Liverpool: Ask your pre-season questions to BBC Sport
title: Liverpool: Ask your pre-season questions to BBC Sport
title_page: Liverpool: Ask your pre-season questions to BBC Sport - BBC Sport
maintext:
The 2023-24 Premier League season is edging ever nearer, so what shape are Liverpool in before the big kick-off on Sunday, 13 August?
We will put your questions to our BBC Radio Merseyside experts for their thoughts on all things Reds.
